main event: A bright light was observed trailing white smoke, emitting a very bright illumination in the sky.
interesting points: The light was bright enough for the observer to read a newspaper.
The light traveled from the southeast to the northwest at an estimated altitude of 35,000 feet or above.
The light suddenly diminished and went out, leaving a trail of white smoke that lasted for about 2 seconds.
The illumination lasted about 3 seconds, and the sighting appeared like the illumination of a large flash bulb.
The observer was an Air Force navigator who was not fatigued or impaired in any way.
sighted object: A bright light with white smoke
witnesses: An Air Force navigator and a passenger in the car
